title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that group 3 in which p16 is blocked does not appear to play a role in blocking cell cycle entry.
The response indicates that group 3 in which p16 is blocked does not appear to play a role in blocking cell cycle entry.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that cells undergoing mitosis are most likely to be found in group 7 OR in groups 4, 5, 6, and 7.
The response indicates that cells undergoing mitosis are most likely to be found in group 7 OR in groups 4, 5, 6, and 7.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not indicate that because blocking some of the cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitors in this experiment made fibroblasts divide, the scientists might also successfully block different cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitors in neurons of the spinal cord to make the neurons reenter the cell cycle and divide.

The response indicates that because blocking some of the cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitors in this experiment made fibroblasts divide, the scientists might also successfully block different cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitors in neurons of the spinal cord to make the neurons reenter the cell cycle and divide.
